snippet.title: Ten Little Indians / ZX Spectrum Text Adventure
snippet.description:
A play-through of the ZX Spectrum text adventure "Ten Little Indians" by Brian Howarth & Wherner Barnes. The emulator speed was set higher so that the pictures were drawn faster than on a real Spectrum.

Used Dorothy Millard's solution as a reference guide.

Part of the ZX Spectrum Text Adventures playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUbeZeUJd5nwPPLqLjNSc8tCjFssEjXrb&feature=view_all Click the link for more text adventures.
